backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing customer, service, invoice, photo, and user profile storage with access control and discount-aware invoice total calculation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring favicon assets, bootstrap environment shim, and mounting the main React app.
frontend/src/api/backendClient.ts: Utility for normalizing backend errors into user‑friendly messages and exporting the backend interface type.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for customers, invoices, and services.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup defining root layout, theme provider, and routes for landing, customers, invoices, services, and details.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell providing header, nav buttons, main content container, and footer with branding.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: Reusable component handling loading, error, and empty states using consistent card UI.
frontend/src/components/BootstrapGate.ts: Wrapper that blocks rendering until Internet Identity initialization completes, showing loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders a header with the business logo and branding text.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays a styled error card and reload option on startup failure.
frontend/src/config/invoiceAssets.ts: Exports static paths and metadata for invoice logo and watermark images.
frontend/src/config/invoiceBranding.ts: Provides static business address, payment instructions, and optional text number for invoices.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Dialog showing customer details with loading, error, and not-found states using useCustomer.
Form for creating or editing a customer, handling validation, submission, and toast feedback.
Customers list page with dialogs for adding, viewing, and editing customers and async state handling.
React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating customers through the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/customers/types.ts: Type definitions for customer data and helper to convert a Customer to form data.
frontend/src/features/invoices/blobStora: Utility for uploading image files as data URLs and returning displayable blob URLs.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceDe: Invoice detail page allowing payment recording, photo management, invoice editing, and viewing customer info.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceFo: Form component for creating and editing invoices, handling validation, submission, and customer/line item selection.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceLi: Editor UI for managing invoice line items, including service selection, quantity, pricing, discounts, and totals.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoicePh: Dialog that displays a full-size preview of an invoice photo using a provided blob URL.
Section for uploading, viewing, previewing, and removing invoice photos with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoicesP: Main invoices page listing invoices with create and edit dialogs, authentication checks, and invoice table display.
frontend/src/features/invoices/photoType: Types and validators for image uploads, including supported formats and file size limits.
frontend/src/features/invoices/queries.t: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating invoices and customers, including form-to-backend data mapping.
frontend/src/features/invoices/SignInReq: UI state prompting the user to sign in via Internet Identity before accessing invoices.
frontend/src/features/invoices/types.ts: Defines invoice-related form types and utility functions for currency, percentage parsing, and line total calculations.
frontend/src/features/landing/LandingPag: Renders the landing page with navigation cards to customers, invoices, and services sections.
frontend/src/features/services/importPar: Parses CSV/TSV service rows, validates required fields and prices, and returns structured ParsedServiceRow entries.
frontend/src/features/services/queries.t: Provides React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and bulk‑import services using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceBu: Implements a dialog for bulk importing services via pasted text or file upload, with preview, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceEd: Provides a form for editing an existing service, including validation and update submission.
Fetches service details and displays the edit form within a page layout with navigation controls.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceIt: Form component for creating a new service with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/services/ServicesP: Displays the list of services with add, edit, and bulk import options using dialogs and tables.
frontend/src/features/services/types.ts: Defines service form and import row types plus currency parsing and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthStatus.ts: Exposes whether the user is authenticated via Internet Identity along with initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, logout, and context utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and invoice watermark styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s overall state, feature list, and versioned capabilities for a Motoko backend and React/Vite frontend.
